result.reason: DirectorySearcher.PageSize is not set (default 0), so LDAP server caps results at 1000; setting PageSize enables paged queries to retrieve all entries.
result.approach: Add ldapSearcher.PageSize = 1000 before FindAll() to enable LDAP paged result retrieval, which bypasses the 1000-entry server limit.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is clear. In `ActiveDirectoryDeserializer.cs` line 51-58, `DirectorySearcher` is used without setting `PageSize`. When `PageSize` is 0 (default), LDAP returns at most 1000 results (server default `MaxPageSize`). Setting `PageSize` to a non-zero value enables paged queries that retrieve all results.

